capabilities.heading: Engineering & Technical Services
capabilities.text: Engineering is one of Olokun's core competencies. Our engineers, designers, and drafters are experts in Hull, Mechanical, and Electrical (HM&E) systems and equipment. Our professional artisans are skilled in integrating systems and equipment in Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Combat Systems, Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance (C5ISR) integration areas. Through cradle-to-grave engineering processes, our artisan performs tasks in concept development, advanced planning, ship checks, design, installation and testing areas. Olokun provides experienced and knowledgeable Program Management Support throughout the lifecycle of design and engineering projects, programs, and contracts. Olokun's artisan and Program Management have experience in NAVFAC, NAVSEA, ABS, MSC, and USCG Regulations.

capabilities.heading: Information Technology
capabilities.text: Our Information Technology Industry Professionals provide information technology development, operations and sustainment services, and cyber security services for the various federal government and commercial customers. Olokun IT professionals design, develop, integrate, test, deploy, and maintain secure software applications and web services hosted in various government and commercial virtual environments. Using technology, Olokun provides digital transformation to change business processes, often leveraging cloud computing, data analytics, and automation. By leveraging technology to enhance interactions and experiences for customers, Olokun uses industry best practices to provide innovative, process-driven approaches to solve technical and business challenges.
